Module com.mihaibojin.props.core
Package com.mihaibojin.props.core.converters

Class Cast

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mihaibojin.props.core.converters.Cast
  • public class Cast
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that makes the API a little bit nicer, e.g.: Prop<Boolean> booleanProp = Props.factory().build().prop("key", Converters.bool());

    • Constructor Summary
